page.title: 19MUNDON HALL FARM
page.content: {Mundon Hall}farm is a mixed farm of 600 acres,situated at the end of Vicarage lane Mundon. 300 acres is used to grow winter wheat and barley,the other 300 is grass land for the dairy herd. The Dairy Herd consists of 100 milking cows and 200 followers,calves and non-milkers. The Herd is a well known show herd of{Holsteins,}which has won many trophies . The farm has four senior bulls each weighing about one and a half tons.The outstanding bull of the moment is {HILLTOP GREATNESS}now{VG All-Britain {1980. All the calves are born with horns, which are removed when they are three weeks old.The heifers are photographed and ear-tagged for record purposes.
